reviews.text: This place makes each dining experience unique in some way. The meals taste wonderful and servings are generous. Great food served with helpful attitudes. Friendly, inviting, kind, professional. This spot merits a visit.

The restaurant provides remarkable service. The standards at El Salvadore√±o are remarkably high! I favor El Salvadore√±o due to their delicious dishes and attentive employees. Their staff and dishes never disappoint. The food here lives up to promises.

I Would Give Them Zero Stars, They Are Racist.  I Walked In And Went Up To The Counter And They Just Looked At Me. Then This Other Gurl Walks In Behind Me And They Both Were Like "Holaaaaaaa" And Still Didnt Even Acknowledge Me While They Answered Her Questions And Then When I Say "Oh So I'm Just Not Standing Here" Then They Still Both Just Looked At Me And One Was Like Sorry And Like Shrugged Her Shoulders. And I Asked If It Was Because I Was Black And Then One Was Like I Thought Yall Were Together (In Spanish To The Gurl That Walked In Behind Me) And I Was Like No You Clearly Saw Me Walk In By Myself.  I Would Never Go There Again And That Was My First Time Walking Into That Restaurant. (I Went Today (9/16) At 2:25pm, If The Owners Care To Know.)

I was craving pupusas and El Salvadore√±o DELIVERED the exact flavors I was looking for. Great pricing, local establishment, and their pupusas are not pre-made ‚Äî always fresh. Looking forward to my next visit already!

As we were passing by Morris park and 180 St. just off the train station, when we saw this restaurant. We were not sure to come in as it didn‚Äôt smell to food.  Very clean! I didn‚Äôt know or heard about this restaurant before so I had many questions about our orders. Gentleman who serve us was very knowledgeable and really nice! best of all, spoke clear English, which was great! He answer all my questions and even offer a little taste of horchata which was delicious! I had Pepper steak and my partner had Soup,  both dishes were delicious. Service was excellent, great atmosphere and food, food was delicious!!! for an unbeatable price!!! We will definitely come again!

Ni siquiera tuvieron la delicadesa de preguntar si lo queriamos asi. Ladronasos Sean serios

Music is way too loud and is cash only, though they do have an ATM available. It seems to be more of a late night bar for men than a restaurant to eat at, as there is a bar, jukebox, poker tables, and pool tables. The pupusas are delicious, but the other food options are pricey.

So upon entering the store there is a menu outside with all the dishes and when you enter theres a regular store with salvadorian or guatemalan products, when you go inside and notice there are seats and food you might be tempted to try the food, i think you should. Not sure wiether its salvadorian or guatemalan food, however it was pretty good for what i got at a good price and it even came with handmade tortillas! Just wish there were menus there so i would know what i would want beforehand, pick what i want with ease and not annoy the workers there

Love the convenience of having a Salvadorean restaurant close by, Their traditional dishes are delicious. The main dish I go in for is their pupusas. Try out their variety of pupusas from cheese to mixed (chicarron, cheese & bean mix)
Very good food. It just wished there was delivery & that the restaurant was on any eating apps.
